description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Canada vs Argentina in the Friendlies Women
title: Friendlies Women
title_page: Canada vs Argentina: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Goal!
Goal! Canada 3, Argentina 0. Julia Grosso (Canada) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
Post
Janine Sonis (Canada) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the right side of the box.
Post
Attempt blocked. Shelina Zadorsky (Canada) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Janine Sonis with a cross.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Post
Delay in match because of an injury Solana Pereyra (Argentina).
